question: If AB is incident plane wave front then refracted wave front in <katex>$(n_2 > n_1)$</katex> will be
images/a1b2c3d4-0046-4000-8000-000000000046.png
explanation: When light travels from rarer to denser (<katex>$n_2 > n_1$</katex>), the speed decreases.
The secondary wavelets travel a shorter distance in the second medium.
This causes the wavefront to bend towards the normal.
